Theory of Computation Made Simple¶

📚 Welcome, Future Computer Scientists!

Theory of Computation can seem scary, but we'll take it step by step together.

This is your safe space to learn at your own pace.

🛤️ Your Learning Journey

1 Basics Start here • 30 min
→
2 Automata Visual learning • 45 min
→
3 Languages Practice time • 60 min
→
4 Complexity Advanced • 45 min

Quick Start Guide¶

New to Theory of Computation? Perfect! Here’s how this works:

🌱

Start Small

Begin with "Basics" - no prior knowledge needed

👀

Visual Learning

Lots of diagrams and examples, minimal text

⏰

Your Pace

Take breaks anytime. Progress is saved automatically

🆘

Always Help

Stuck? Click "Need Help?" boxes everywhere

Content Overview¶

🧩

Basics

What is computation? Start with simple concepts

⏱️ 30 minutes
🤖

Automata

State machines made visual and easy

⏱️ 45 minutes
🔤

Languages

Formal languages without the fear

⏱️ 60 minutes
⚡

Complexity

Big O and computational limits

⏱️ 45 minutes

💪 You've Got This!

Theory of Computation is just logical thinking with rules.
You already think logically every day - now we'll add some structure to it.
